duas.title: Dua for Mercy
duas.arabic: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ وَارْحَمْ وَأَنْتَ خَيْرُ الرَّاحِمِينَ
duas.translation: My Lord, forgive and have mercy, and You are the best of the merciful.
duas.transliteration: Rabbi ighfir warham wa anta khayru ar-raahimeen

duas.title: Dua for Knowledge
duas.arabic: رَّبِّ زِدْنِي عِلْمًا
duas.translation: My Lord, increase me in knowledge.
duas.transliteration: Rabbi zidnee ‘ilmaa

duas.title: Dua for Patience
duas.arabic: رَبِّ أَفْرِغْ عَلَيَّ صَبْرًا
duas.translation: My Lord, pour upon me patience.
duas.transliteration: Rabbi afrigh ‘alayya sabraa

duas.title: Dua for Guidance
duas.arabic: اهْدِنَا الصِّرَاطَ الْمُسْتَقِيمَ
duas.translation: Guide us to the straight path.
duas.transliteration: Ihdinas-siraatal-mustaqeem

duas.title: Dua for Forgiveness
duas.arabic: رَبَّنَا ظَلَمْنَا أَنْفُسَنَا
duas.translation: Our Lord, we have wronged ourselves.
duas.transliteration: Rabbanaa zhalamnaa anfusanaa

duas.title: Dua for Rizq (Provision)
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اكْفِنِي بِحَلَالِكَ عَنْ حَرَامِكَ وَأَغْنِنِي بَفَضْلِكَ عَمَّنْ سِوَاكَ
duas.translation: O Allah, suffice me with Your lawful (halal) and keep me away from Your unlawful (haram), and make me independent by Your grace from all others.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma ikfini bihalalika ‘an haramika wa aghnini bifadlika ‘amman siwak

duas.title: Dua for Ease in Difficulty
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ لَا سَهْلَ إِلَّا مَا جَعَلْتَهُ سَهْلًا وَأَنْتَ تَجْعَلُ الْحَزْنَ إِذَا شِئْتَ سَهْلًا
duas.translation: O Allah, there is nothing easy except what You make easy, and You can make the difficult easy if You wish.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma la sahla illa ma ja’altahu sahlan wa anta taj’alul-hazna itha shi’ta sahlan

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Evil
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ عَافِيَتَكَ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالْآخِرَةِ
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for well-being in this world and the Hereafter.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma inni as’aluka ‘afiyataka fid-dunya wal-akhirah

duas.title: Dua for Good Health
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ عَافِنِي فِي بَدَنِي وَاللَّهُمَّ عَافِنِي فِي سَمْعِي وَبَصَرِي، لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ
duas.translation: O Allah, grant me good health in my body, and in my hearing and sight. None has the right to be worshipped but You.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma ‘afini fi badani, Allahumma ‘afini fi sam’i wa basari, la ilaha illa anta

duas.title: Dua for Gratitude
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ لَكَ أَحْمَدُ وَإِلَيْكَ أَفْتَحُ، وَإِلَيْكَ أَشْكُرُ
duas.translation: O Allah, all praise is for You. I open my heart to You and thank You.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma laka ahmad, wa ilayka aftahu, wa ilayka ashkur

duas.title: Dua for Guidance to the Right Path
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اهْدِنِي لِطَارِقِ الْهُدَى وَالْرَّشَادِ
duas.translation: O Allah, guide me to the straight path of guidance and righteousness.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma ihdini li tariqil-huda war-rushad

duas.title: Dua for Righteousness
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اجعلني من الصالحين
duas.translation: O Allah, make me among the righteous.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma ajilni min as-saliheen

duas.title: Dua for Goodness in This World
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَعِنِّي عَلَى ذِكْرِكَ وَشُكْرِكَ وَحُسْنِ عِبَادَتِكَ
duas.translation: O Allah, help me to remember You, thank You, and worship You in the best manner.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma a’inni ‘ala dhikrika wa shukrika wa husni ‘ibadatik

duas.title: Dua for Success
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ يَسِّرْ لِي أَمْرِي وَاحْفَظْنِي بِرَحْمَتِكَ
duas.translation: O Allah, make my affairs easy and keep me safe by Your mercy.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma yassir li amri wa hafizni birahmatika

duas.title: Dua for Removing Anxiety
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحُزْنِ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from worry and sadness, and I seek refuge in You from incapacity and laziness.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma inni a’udhu bika minal-hammi wal-huzn, wa a’udhu bika minal-‘ajzi wal-kasali

duas.title: Dua for Happiness
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اجعلني من السعداء في الدنيا والآخرة
duas.translation: O Allah, make me among the happy in this world and the Hereafter.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma ajilni min as-sa’daa’i fi ad-dunya wal-akhirah

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Sin
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ طَهِّرْ قَلْبِي مِنَ الْخَطَايَا وَالْذُنُوبِ
duas.translation: O Allah, purify my heart from sins and mistakes.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma tahhir qalbi min al-khataya wa al-dhunub

duas.title: Dua for Success in Worship
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ تَقَبَّلْ صَلَاتِي وَصِيَامِي وَعَمَلِي الصَّالِحَ
duas.translation: O Allah, accept my prayers, fasting, and righteous deeds.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma taqabbal salati wa siyami wa ‘amali as-salih

duas.title: Dua for Love of Allah
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اجعل حبك أحب إلي من نفسي ومن أهلي ومالي وولدي وقرَّة عيني
duas.translation: O Allah, make Your love more beloved to me than myself, my family, my wealth, my children, and the coolness of my eyes.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma ajil hubbaka ahabba ilayya min nafsi wa min ahli wa mali wa waladi wa qurrat ‘ayni

duas.title: Dua for Barakah (Blessing)
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بارِكْ لَنَا فِيْ رِزْقِنَا وَعَافِنَا فِي أَجْسَادِنَا
duas.translation: O Allah, bless us in our sustenance and grant us good health.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma barik lana fi rizqina wa ‘afina fi as-sadad

duas.title: Dua for Righteous Children
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اجعلني من أولاد الصالحين
duas.translation: O Allah, make me among the righteous children.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma ajilni min awlad as-saliheen

duas.title: Dua for Gratitude for Blessings
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْعِمْ عَلَيْنَا بِنِعَمِكَ وَعَافِنَا فِي دِينِنَا وَدُنْيَانَا
duas.translation: O Allah, bestow Your blessings upon us and grant us well-being in our religion and our worldly life.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma an’im ‘alayna bini’amika wa ‘afina fi dinina wa dunyana

duas.title: Dua for Success in Life
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اجعل النجاح حليفنا في الدنيا والآخرة
duas.translation: O Allah, make success our companion in this world and the Hereafter.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma ajilil najaaha halifana fi ad-dunya wal-akhirah

duas.title: Dua to Seek Forgiveness
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَنتَ رَبِّي لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ، خَلَقْتَنِي وَأَنَا عَبْدُكَ
duas.translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, there is no deity but You. You created me and I am Your servant.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma anta rabbi la ilaha illa anta, khalaqtani wa ana ‘abduka

duas.title: Dua for Mercy and Forgiveness
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اجعلني من التوابين، واجعلني من المتطهرين
duas.translation: O Allah, make me among those who repent and purify themselves.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma ajilni min at-tawwabeena, wa ajilni min al-mutaahhireen

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Hellfire
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَجِرْنِي مِنَ النَّارِ
duas.translation: O Allah, save me from the Hellfire.
duas.transliteration: Allahuma ajirna min an-naar

duas.title: Dua for Steadfastness
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ ثَبِّتْ قَلْبِي عَلَى دِينِكَ
duas.translation: O Allah, make my heart firm upon Your religion.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma thabbit qalbi ‘ala dinika
